ReturnPolicy.Description: Items must be returned in original condition with tags.

Title: Nina Ricci Rhodium Plated Pendant with Jet Swarovski Crystals - 16-18" length
Description: Nina Ricci Rhodium Plated Pendant with Jet Swarovski Crystals - 16-18" length. Manufacturing Standards: Made in Canada. Lead & Nickel Free.All crystals are Swarovski crystals. Each crystal is hand set.Pearls are Japanese glass coated in nacre.Earring Posts are hypoallergenic Surgical SteelNina Ricci Plating Standards: Each item is plated three times to make Nina Ricci jewellery one of the highest quality fashion lines in the world. This world class plating process allows Nina Ricci jewellery to maintain its lustre throughout the years. Gold Plated items are 22kt gold. Gold items are triple plated to increase scratch resistance and reduce likelihood of tarnishing.Silver items are Rhodium plated. Rhodium is from the Platinum family of metals. It is stronger than silver, does not tarnish, and is resistant to scratches. To maintain your jewellery always avoid spraying perfumes or working with chemical products while wearing your jewellery. Multiple Purchases: For buyers wishing to make multiple purchases I will charge an additional $1.00 in shipping for every item after the 1st purchase.
